mapper.select: select * from board where board_type in ('00','01') order by board_type asc
mapper.insert: insert into board(bno ,kind , board_type , title , content , reg_date , id) values (seq_board.nextval, '00' , '00' , #{title} , #{content} , sysdate , 'admin')
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} , mod_date = sysdate where bno= #{bno}
